modules.description: Provides functions to manage and retrieve units of measurement, including adding units with their labels and converting labels back to unit strings. Operates on hash tables mapping unit names to labels, and generates Notty images for visual representation. Used to dynamically associate and display units in measurement-based applications.

Provides operations to create and manage ordering strategies, including increasing and decreasing orders. Works with a custom type `t` and a hash table mapping string labels to order configurations. Supports comparing values based on predefined orders or labels, useful for sorting or ranking data in specific sequences.

Generates Notty images from statistical data structures, including header layouts, field summaries, and sorted result displays. Operates on hash tables mapping strings to OLS analysis results, rectangles for layout, and predictor names. Constructs visual representations of regression outcomes, highlighting top and bottom performers within specified dimensions.

Generates terminal-based visualizations from statistical data structures, including regression results and field metadata. Processes rectangular layouts, string predictors, and OLS analysis results to construct formatted images. Used to display model coefficients and variable characteristics in a compact, readable format.

Records monotonic clock and garbage collection metrics for function execution. Operates on functions and timing data, providing low-level performance insights. Enables detailed analysis of code behavior under real-world conditions.

Manages measurement units, ordering strategies, and statistical visualizations through hash tables and custom types, generating Notty images for dynamic data representation. Supports unit conversion, value comparison based on order configurations, and display of regression results with labeled fields and sorted outputs. Operations include adding units, defining order sequences, and rendering structured statistical summaries. Examples include displaying coefficient tables, ranking variables by significance, and converting unit labels to string representations.
